experience.description:
Engaged in a short-term contract to ensure timely project delivery for the
client. Spearheaded the development of software for internet and television
broadcasting, facilitating live broadcasts while seamlessly allowing real-time
data modification and results storage. By the end of the contract, the project
was completed and successfully delivered to the client.

The project im was working on is helping big companies to manage
their Invoices and Purchase orders from SAP on a webportal. While working
on this project, I've implemented search and filtering by any parameters and
documents, that made portal a lot easier to user and provided better UX.
Also while figuring how the project works, I've created documentation and
added new about the search window.

My squad was a part of 4g & 5g private networks development.
During my work here I have refactored some modules to remove memory
leaks and fix some logic errors. After that, these modules were accepted to
production.

- Creating various map plugins like optimal routes*, masking rate of terrain,
shooting calculation etc. I have successfully integrated all the calculations
that was ordered by the client. Most of the plugins I have created myself.
However my company was helping students to get work experience and I
was also managing and helping these students to create other calculations.

- My role at this company was to develop a software that would collect data
about devices created on a factory and create/update a database that store
all their configurations and characteristics. I have developed a database and
bash script that collects all data about devices parse and push data
collected from script to a database. After the project was successfully
integrated, all the data about devices that were created, updated or returned
back to repair was accurate and available any time.

higher.name: Санкт-Петербургский национальный исследовательский университет информационных технологий, механики и оптики, Санкт-Петербург
Санкт-Петербургский национальный исследовательский университет информационных технологий, механики и оптики, Санкт-Петербург
